data.comment: The match has started at Villa Park.
Aston Villa are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Aston Villa.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Birmingham to check on Ross Barkley, who is grimacing with pain.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Brighton at Villa Park.
The home team has substituted Ross Barkley with Bertrand Traore. Dean Smith is thus making his first change.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Aston Villa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Aston Villa's John McGinn misses with an attempt on goal.
Michael Oliver awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 9, In Birmingham, Trezeguet of Aston Villa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Aston Villa, close to Brighton's area.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in Birmingham.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Danny Welbeck is on target to give Brighton a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 12, Adam Lallana instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Important block from the Brighton defence as Ollie Watkins fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
Aston Villa are pushing forward but Trezeguet's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Birmingham.
In the minute 20, Aston Villa needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
In the minute 23, Aston Villa's Bertrand Traore is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Brighton pushes forward through Neal Maupay, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 25, Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Brighton's half.
Douglas Luiz (Aston Villa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Aston Villa are coming forward and Trezeguet gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 26, Brighton have a goal kick.
Aston Villa drives forward and Jack Grealish gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 31, Adam Lallana of Brighton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 34, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver awards Brighton a goal kick.
Trezeguet for Aston Villa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Throw-in for Brighton at Villa Park.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa just outside Brighton's area.
Aston Villa's Tyrone Mings gets in a shot on goal at Villa Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Birmingham.
In the minute 40, Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 42, Aston Villa push forward at Villa Park and Jack Grealish gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brighton defence.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Aston Villa's Matt Targett has been booked in Birmingham.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Aston Villa.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Birmingham.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Aston Villa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The away team replace Adam Lallana with Joel Veltman.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Ezri Konsa.
In the minute 47, Great play from Bertrand Traore to set up the goal.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Brighton.
Michael Oliver blows against Aston Villa's Trezeguet for offside.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Douglas Luiz of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Solly March.
Pascal Gross with an assist there.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 59, Aston Villa are coming forward and Douglas Luiz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In Birmingham Aston Villa's Bertrand Traore is caught offside.
In the minute 64, Free kick in a good position for Brighton!
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, Yves Bissouma (Brighton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
In the minute 70, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 73, Brighton are pushing forward but Danny Welbeck's finish is wide of the goal.
Michael Oliver awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Michael Oliver signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 75, Dean Smith is making the team's second substitution at Villa Park with Anwar El Ghazi replacing Bertrand Traore.
Conor Hourihane is replacing Douglas Luiz for the home team.
In the minute 76, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Brighton needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In Birmingham, Neal Maupay (Brighton) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
In the minute 79, Michael Oliver waits before resuming play because Danny Welbeck for Brighton is still down.
Danny Welbeck is back on the pitch.
Brighton make their second substitution with Dan Burn replacing Neal Maupay.
In the minute 81, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Aston Villa, close to Brighton's area.
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brighton at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 83, Free kick Aston Villa.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Birmingham.
In the minute 87, Can Aston Villa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Aston Villa's Trezeguet misses with an attempt on goal.
Michael Oliver awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Brighton.
Tariq Lamptey is booked for the away team.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in Birmingham.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Brighton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Aston Villa.
Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in Birmingham.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
At Villa Park, Jack Grealish has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Tariq Lamptey has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Jayson Molumby is on a sub for Pascal Gross for Brighton.
